Name: Access Keys
Author: AccessibleFutures.org / Cory Bohon
Description: Allows an Omeka administrator to specify site-wide keyboard shortcuts for blind or visually impaired end users.

Name: Add Item Link

Description: Add an add item link to the admin bar

Description: Add a field to the Exhibit database table. (You'll have to make changes in Exhibit Builder to be able to access and make changes to this field, sorry.)

Name: AddThis
Note: Only common social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Tumblr, email) and embed, but not AddThis.

Description: Adds the Addthis button/script to Omeka

Name: Admin Analytics
Note: Analytics Snippet supports public and admin side of the site, together or separately.

Description: An Omeka  plugin that tracks usage of the admin panel, potentially useful for project managers and teachers who wish to track logins and usage patterns.

Name: Admin Images
Note: Assets in Omeka S.

Description: This Omeka 2.0+ plugin allows administrators to upload images not attached to items for use in carousels and simple pages

Name: Admin User Management

Description: Allows administrative users to manage users.

Name: Advanced Search Element Order

Description: Reorder elements in Advanced Search dropdown box according to their element types.

Description: Adds way to quickly create records via ajax

Name: Amazon S3 Storage Adapter
Author: EHRI
Description: Storage adapter for Amazon S3 based on the official AWS SDK.

Name: Analytics
Note: Analytics Snippet manages submodules that can ping any analytics system. See an example for Piwik [Analytics Snippet - Piwik].
Author: Tim Hollies
Description: Adds more advanced Google Analytics tracking to Omeka

Name: Analytics Dimensions
Note: Analytics Snippet manages submodules that can ping any analytics system. See an example for Piwik [Analytics Snippet - Piwik].
Author: Bowling Green State University Libraries
Description: Google Analytics with dimensions for collections and exhibits.

Name: Annotate

Name: Annotations

Name: Annotator

Name: Architecture Analyse Type
Note: Vocabularies are now standardized and importable directly (rdf).
Author: Pxg
Description: Add a new type 'Architecture d'analyse' to Omeka. This type is composed of elements

Name: Archive Document
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: The format of the documents that is used internally by OAI-PMH Static Repository and some other plugins.

Name: Archive Folder
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Automatically import a local or remote folder into Omeka as collections, items, files, and metadata.

Name: Archive Repertory
Author: Daniel Berthereau, adapted by George Soules, Southwest Harbor Public Library (SWHPL)
Description: This adaptation retains the flat Okema derivative file structure instead of using the plugin's hierarchical structure 'collection/item/files'.

Name: Ark & Noid
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Create short, unique, meaningless, universal and persistent identifiers (ark and/or noid) and use them as urls for records.

Name: ASHP specific XML file
Author: American Social History Project
Description: adds an ashp XML feed to your Omeka site, enabling you to use the wordpress-omeka link plugin.

Name: Assignments
Author: Bowling Green State University Libraries
Description: Create a new student role and allow assignment of students to exhibits.

Name: Assign Owner
Author: Anurag
Description: Assign ownership of items to a specific user

Name: Astrodome Citations
Author: Erin Bell
Description: Filters citation format

Name: Audio Recorder
Author: Ned Henry; UCSC Library Digital Initiative
Description: This Omeka 2.0+ plugin provides an in-browser audio recorder which can attach resulting recordings to Omeka items.

Name: Auto Gloss
Author: Johnathon Beals
Description: Auto-gloss element texts with tooltip definitions.

Name: AvalonVideo
Author: Indiana University Library
Description: Embeds an iFrame for playing back Avalon Video.

Name: AvantCommon
Author: George Soules, Southwest Harbor Public Library

Name: AvantCustom
Author: George Soules, Southwest Harbor Public Library

Name: AvantElements
Author: George Soules, Southwest Harbor Public Library

Name: AvantRelationships
Author: George Soules, Southwest Harbor Public Library

Name: AvantSearch
Author: George Soules, Southwest Harbor Public Library
Description: Provides extended search results cababilites for the public interface.

Name: BagIt
Author: Scholars' Lab
Description: Implements the BagIt specification for storing collections of files. Adds an administrative interface that allows users to (a) generate and export Bags containing files on the site and (b) import Bags and make their contents available through the Dropbox interface.

Name: Beam Me Up to Internet Archive
Author: Pop Up Archive
Description: Posts items to the Internet Archive as they are saved.

Name: Beam Me Up to SoundCloud
Author: Pop Up Archive
Description: Posts items to SoundCloud as they are saved.

Name: Bibnum BxM

Description: Quelques modifications apportées à omeka pour répondre à des petits besoins Bordeaux Montaigne qui ne nécessitent pas un plugin chacun

Name: Bulk Users

Name: Cart
Author: Franck Dupont - Limonade&Co <technique@limonadeandco.fr>

Name: Casify

Name: Clean Url

Name: Date Picker
Author: Erin Bell

Name: Date Search
Author: Gero Zahn
Description: Date Search will take of your dates and timespans that you enter in your items' text fields, using the YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format, if necessary with [G] or [J] prefix for Gregorian/Julian dates. In 'Advanced Search', you may search for dates: If you search for '1970', your item containing the timespan '1960-1980' will be found. — Works great with enhanced Item Relations featuring relation comments.

Name: Deepzoom Viewer
Note: OpenSeadragon is integrated in Omeka S and the module IIIF Server may create tiles automatically.
Author: Gjergj Sheldija, gjergj.sheldija@gmail.com

Name: Default Sort
Author: The Digital Ark
Description: Allows an admin to set the default sort for 'Browse Items' and 'Browse Collections'

Name: Derivative Images
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media

Name: Digitool
Author: Libis

Author: UC Santa Cruz University Library
Description: Adds the ability to import Vimeo videos into Omeka as items while preserving as much metadata as possible

Name: Visuals
Author: University of Twente and Meertens Institute Amsterdam
Description: Provides several additional ways of visualizing data in an Omeka instance

Name: Vocatroll
Author: ASHP/CML
Description: Helps enforcing a controlled vocabulary. Vocatroll customizes item (and collection) edit/new page to help with controlled vocabulary and consistent data entry. This plugin can also generates browse pages for Subject and Coverage Fields.

Name: VoiceCommenting
Author: Mike Feher and Bryan Fuselier
Description: Allows voice commenting on Items, Collections, Exhibits, and more

Name: VRA Core
Note: Vocabularies are now standardized and importable directly (rdf).
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media
Description: Adds VRA Core Elements to Item, Collection, and File metadata.

Name: VRA Core Element Set
Note: Vocabularies are now standardized and importable directly (rdf).
Author: Scholars' Lab
Description: Create VRA Core element set in Omeka database.

Name: Web Services Shortcodes
Author: Roy Rosenweig Center for History and New Media
Description: Makes shortcodes available for embedding content from web services.

Name: Website_URL_Add
Author: Cicely
Description: The plugin converts the Website URL Metadata into a link

Name: WikiCite for Omeka
Author: Jeremy Boggs
Description: Adds Wikipedia citations codes to each public item or collection.

Name: XMediaLinks
Author: Eric C. Weig
Description: Given a delimited text string, this plugin creates a field display with image based hyperlink to an external media resource, along with a textual description of the resource.

Name: XML Import
Author: Daniel Berthereau (based on GenericXmlImporter of Scholars' Lab)
Description: Imports metadata and files from one or multiple XML via a generic or a custom XSLT sheet and via CSV Import+.

Name: XmlSitemap
Author: Kevin Reiss; digitalMETRO Project
Description: Set up a XML Sitemap for an omeka instance. Public content appears in sitemap. Configuration choices available. digitalMETRO Project [http://nycdigital.org/]

Name: YouTube Import
Author: UC Santa Cruz Library
Description: Adds the ability to import Youtube videos into Omeka as items while preserving as much metadata as possible

Name: Zoom.it
Note: The module IIIF Server may create tiles automatically for the default viewer OpenSeadragon.
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media
Description: Embeds a Zoom.it image viewer into item show pages.

Name: Zotero Import
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media
Description: Imports libraries and collections from Zotero user and group accounts.
